name: Sudders v. United National Insurance Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Sudders v. United National Insurance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. See Nat. Grange M. Ins. Co. v. Kuhn, 428 Pa. 179, 236 A. 2d 758 (1968), and Gr. Am. Ins. Co. v. Am. Arb. Assn., 436 Pa. 370, 260 A. 2d 769 (1970).
Mr. Justice Jones dissents.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph Lurie, with him Galfand, Berger, Seneshy & Lurie, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Sudders v. United National Insurance Company, Appellant.
Argued November 8, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Joseph Lurie, with him Galfand, Berger, Seneshy & Lurie, for appellant.
Julius E. Fioravanti, for appellee.
December 20, 1971:
